channel.title: HD and non-HD
channel.description: I was wondering if anyone could figure out why my computer glitches on non-HD clients it also happens in the actual rs client too. When I'm using HD it's fine seeing as most servers don't actually support HD yet I'm in need of either a good HD client and source or a fix.... Ok I just worked out it seems to want to do it on any low graphical JAVA programs.
